text:
1. Page Title: Confusion and Repulsion

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Raskolnikov in a dim passage, anxious.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: “What am I doing here?” 
       • Raskolnikov: “This is madness, utter madness!”

   - Panel 2 — Setup: Outside, he pauses, overwhelmed.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: “Oh, God, how loathsome it all is!”
       • Raskolnikov: “What filthy things my heart can think.”

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov experiences intense confusion and repulsion after a troubling encounter with Alyona Ivanovna, reflecting on the dark thoughts that have plagued him.
